timeline.message:
Marketplace improvement and fixes

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: Will this get updated per release by the replacer module?
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,16 +1,17 @@
 #!/usr/bin/env bash
 set -ex
 
-if [[ "$#" -ne 1 ]]; then
-  echo "You must provide the Mirror Node image tag"
+if [[ "$#" -lt 1 ]]; then
+  echo "You must provide the Mirror Node image tag (e.g. 0.14.0)"
   exit 1
 fi
 
-tag="${1}"
+tag="${1#v}" # Strip v prefix if present
 tag_minor="${tag%\.*}"
-bats_tag="latest"
-postgresql_tag="latest"
-registry="gcr.io/mirror-node-public/hedera-mirror-node"
+source_tag="0.13.2"
